intro: Aneilema longirrhizum, commonly known as the long-rooted aneilema, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Commelinaceae and is characterized by its upright growth habit and striking, showy flowers. The plant typically has lance-shaped leaves and produces clusters of small, white or pinkish flowers. Its rhizomatous root system is notable for its length and is often used in traditional medicine. Aneilema longirrhizum thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in forest understories.
